text: Sphingomonas oryziterrae is a Gram-negative and rod-shaped bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from rhizosphere soil from rice fields (Oryza sativa) in Jinju in Korea.UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas oryziterrae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase oryziterrae Category:Bacteria described in 2011
title: Sphingomonas oryziterrae
